body_html: As far as I understood MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET specifies the minimum mac os version that the program can run with. Anyway, setting MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.13 didn't change the result.
body_text: As far as I understood MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET specifies the minimum mac os version that the program can run with. Anyway, setting MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.13 didn't change the result.
body: As far as I understood `MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET` specifies the _minimum_ mac os version that the program can run with. Anyway, setting `MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.13` didn't change the result.
